attributes.action: make of every license payer a shareholder of the BBC and  to be able to vote for the nomination of the trust and executive members.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a license fee payer, like for shareholders of a company, license fee payers should be able to vote and nominate members of the bbc's trust and executive board! Also license fee payers should be able also to dismiss them if 50% plus one (absolute majority of shareholder)are dissatisfy of memmbers of boards  during their term of office.
